episode_summary: This episode features discussions on film parodies, the world's largest manhole cover, the historical meaning of 'spaceman,' and a spider that preys on mosquitoes that have fed on humans.

facts.fact: Jurassic World Dominion is the first film to have its parody movie be released before it itself was released.
Britain is home to the planet's largest manhole cover.
A spaceman was originally a journalist paid according to how much space their writing took up.
There is a spider in East Africa that really wants to eat us, but because it can't, it finds other animals that have eaten us and eats that instead.
